67-2201. FISCAL YEAR. The fiscal year of the state of Idaho shall commence on the first day of July in each year, beginning with July 1st, 1941 and close on the thirtieth day of June of the following year.

[67-2201, added 1941, ch. 63, sec. 1, p. 123.]

67-2202. DATE FOR CLOSING ACCOUNTS. All officers, boards, departments and institutions of the state of Idaho shall keep and close all accounts and perform all duties in connection therewith, in accordance with said fiscal year, except as otherwise provided in the constitution.

[67-2202, added 1941, ch. 63, sec. 2, p. 123.]

67-2203. PERIOD COVERED BY ANNUAL AND BIENNIAL REPORTS. All annual or biennial reports made or required to be made by any officer, board, department or institution of the state of Idaho shall include all transactions of such offices, boards, departments or institutions to and including the thirtieth day of June, provided, the annual reports made at the close of the fiscal year ending June 30, 1941, and the biennial reports made at the close of the fiscal year ending June 30, 1942, shall cover all transactions from the ending date of the last annual or biennial reports, respectively.

[67-2203, added 1941, ch. 63, sec. 3, p. 123.]
